## This project 

## Fetch the data from gapminder (CO2 emissions per person and gdp per capita s inflation adjusted), using the following link: https://www.gapminder.org/data/ 

## Make sure you have R installed and ready to run the code (We used R (4.0.3) and RStudio (1.4.1717).)

## Clone the repository from github and read it into R. Run the code, and you are good to go! Comments are included in the Rmd file.
